title: Large Crypto Trader's $7M LINK Deposits to Binance Signals Profit-Taking as Token Hits 17-Month High
description: LINK surged 9% to $11 Monday, posting one of the best monthly returns among large-cap cryptocurrencies with a 43% gain.

title: BlackRock could ‘seed’ spot Bitcoin ETF by the end of October, filing suggests
description:
BlackRock may soon contribute seed funding to its iShares spot Bitcoin (BTC) exchange-traded fund (ETF), according to Bloomberg analyst Eric Balchunas Oct. 23. Balchunas noted that recent filings suggest that BlackRock intends to contribute seed funding at an unspecified date in October. He further explained that ETF seeding occurs when an entity purchases a limited amount […]

The post BlackRock could ‘seed’ spot Bitcoin ETF by the end of October, filing suggests appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: FTX Creditors’ fight for fair compensation amid bankruptcy
description: Legal representatives for non-U.S. creditors of FTX.com are pushing for approval of a proposed deal that would allocate up to 90% of remaining assets to investors who held funds on the platform prior to its bankruptcy. The deal is seen as a significant step towards compensating affected users who were impacted by the exchange’s financial ... Read more

title: Is Brazil about to solve the biggest problem in digital currency?
description: Roberto Campos Neto, the President of Brazil’s Central Bank, recently elucidated the challenges in harmonizing open networks with privacy features within distributed ledger technology (DLT). At the 2023 Council of the Americas Symposium and BRAVO Business Awards in Miami on Friday, he emphasized that most Central Bank Digital Currencies (CBDCs) are not purely DLT-based but ... Read more

title: Solana Leads the Way As Institutions Pour Millions Into Crypto Markets Amid Bitcoin ETF Excitement: CoinShares
description:
Digital assets manager CoinShares says Ethereum (ETH) rival Solana (SOL) is an institutional favorite as the crypto market boils over with Bitcoin (BTC) exchange-traded fund (ETF) fervor. In its latest Digital Asset Fund Flows report, CoinShares finds that institutional investors have poured more money into Solana than any other non-BTC digital asset over the last week and […]

The post Solana Leads the Way As Institutions Pour Millions Into Crypto Markets Amid Bitcoin ETF Excitement: CoinShares appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
